name: Master Yoda
description: With lab-tested THC levels that reach over 20%, strong medicine, Master Yoda is. This strain, however, is not about brute “Force,” as the original Master Yoda would know, and the sativa side of this mostly indica buzz has just enough of an uplifting balance to please just about anyone. Master Yoda clinched 1st Place at High Times Los Angeles Cannabis Cup in 2012, where the OG Kush and Master Kush cross was already a local favorite. Growers also like this strain for its hybrid resilience and its 8 week flowering time.
descriptionPlain: With lab-tested THC levels that reach over 20%, strong medicine, Master Yoda is. This strain, however, is not about brute “Force,” as the original Master Yoda would know, and the sativa side of this mostly indica buzz has just enough of an uplifting balance to please just about anyone. Master Yoda clinched 1st Place at High Times Los Angeles Cannabis Cup in 2012, where the OG Kush and Master Kush cross was already a local favorite. Growers also like this strain for its hybrid resilience and its 8 week flowering time.
aka: Yoda, Master Yoda OG, Master Yoda Kush, Yoda Kush, Master OG, Master OG Kush

highlightedReviews.text: this is one of the most potent strains I've ever put into my body. it's almost 4:20 pm right now and I'm still high as all hell from my wake and bake this morning at 9am. I've been smoking solid for a year now and this is by far the best smoke I've had. it's a little harsh on the inhale but coughing makes you like 10 times more higher -Saul Silver

articles.title: Which Strains Did Leafly Users Consume on 4/20?
articles.author: Sara Dilley
articles.text:
April 20th, or "4/20", is a day of celebration in the cannabis industry, and most consumers spent the day doing just that: consuming! We asked Leafly users on social media how they’d be spending the holiday, and the responses painted a colorful list of strains spanning the spectrum from euphoria-inducing sativas to pain-relieving indicas.
Here’s a glimpse of what Leafly users consumed on this year's 4/20:
 
Granddaddy Purple

Granddaddy Purple, the famous cross of Purple Urkle and Big Bud, is a California staple that can be found all along the west coast. With a sweet grape and berry aroma, this powerful indica exhibits potent psychoactive effects that are felt in both the mind and body. Those who consumed GDP on 4/20 likely found their minds drifting toward a cerebral bliss while their bodies were firmly locked to the couch.
 
Jack Diesel

If you consumed Jack Diesel for the holiday, you were in for an exciting, energetic day. Jack Diesel is a cross of Jack Herer and NYC Diesel that brings on potent, long-lasting sativa effects. What begins as an uplifting buzz gives way to immediate relaxation, followed by an energetic, creative rush. A great choice for those who spent the day at events!
 
Jack Herer

You don’t have to be an activist to appreciate the blissful, clear-headed, creative effects of Jack Herer. Named for Jack Herer, the marijuana activist and author of The Emperor Wears No Clothes, this strain offers cerebral elevation while also boasting the heavy resin of indicas. Those who consumed Jack Herer for 4/20 were in for a day of truly joyous, energetic celebration!
 
Mango

Don’t let Mango's namesake orange coloring fool you: this strain is indica all the way. If you smoked, vaporized, or otherwise consumed Mango on 4/20, you no doubt felt a wave of relaxation kick in almost immediately. Soothing relaxation quickly gives way to a blissful euphoria, leaving you ready and willing to celebrate even more!
 
Master Yoda

Had a wonderful and relaxing 4/20 with Master Yoda, you did. This mostly indica buzz is peppered with an uplifting sativa balance that blends creativity and euphoria with the relaxing indica properties. The force is strong with this strain, and we have no doubt it enabled a truly other-worldly 4/20!
 
Northern Lights

Northern Lights is another strain best consumed by those who observed the holiday from the comforts of home. One of the most famous and beloved strains of all time, it exhibits pungently sweet, spicy aromas that radiate from crystal-coated buds. Northern Lights' pronounced relaxing effects resonate throughout the body, soothing muscles and calming the mind into blissful euphoria.
 
Platinum GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies)

Platinum GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) is just the trick for patients who wanted to celebrate the holiday while also relieving their severe pain, nausea, swelling, migraines, or stress. After filling your nose with a berry sweetness, the effects of this strain melt away physical and mental symptoms of stress, leaving your mind clear and your body ready to celebrate 4/20 pain-free.
 
Sour Diesel

Known for its happy, uplifting euphoria, Sour Diesel is a great choice for patients and recreational consumers alike. Those who rung in the holiday with this strain were treated to fast-acting energy and dreamy cerebral effects that lasted throughout the day. A perfect choice for 4/20!
 
Sour Kush

Sour Kush is a citrus-flavored hybrid offers the best of both worlds: it provides consumers an uplifting experience without overwhelming sedative effects, but it also delivers powerful pain relief. For this reason, it’s a great daytime strain for medical patients seeking relief. On 4/20, Sour Kush delivered the pain-relieving qualities you needed without sacrificing your energy.
 
White Widow

White Widow has achieved worldwide fame and it’s no wonder that Leafly users chose to celebrate the biggest industry holiday with this classic. The hybrid delivers a powerful burst of euphoria and energy from the start, boosting creativity and conversation. A blissful state of mind follows, leaving you ready for anything that comes your way. A truly great fit for any 4/20 itinerary!

articles.title: The 2014 Washington Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, High Times awarded another round of trophies to growers and extract artists showing their best of the best. This year's Cup took place in Everett, Washington, a small city nestled in Washington's panorama of snowcapped mountains. Even the sun, typically shy to Washington state, came out of hiding to see another round of champions bloom before us. Check out which strains took home the bronze, silver, and gold this year! Did any of your favorites make the cut?
 
Best U.S. Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Super Silver Haze from Life is Good Healing
2nd Place: Hawaiian Dutch from Zen Living Cooperative & Just Ice Wax Co-Lab
3rd Place: Durban Poison from TJ’S Organic Gardens
 
Best U.S. Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Cookie Monster from The Source Genetics
2nd Place: Grandma’s Batch from Heirloom Genetics
3rd Place: Kaya’s Koffee from PacificNwRoots
 
Best U.S. Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Rare Dankness Seeds’ Veganic Starkiller OG from William Braveheart Green for Vegamatrix
2nd Place: Lemon Tree from Creek Side
3rd Place: Thin Mint Cookies from Gold Coast Collection
 
Best U.S. Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Lemon Fire Nug Run from Mr. B Extracts
2nd Place: Master Yoda Batter from Brutal Bee with KC Extracts
3rd Place: OG Ghost Train Haze #1 Sugar Wax from A Greener Today
 
Best Medical Sativa Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Super Lemon Haze from Olympia Mike
2nd Place: Blue Dream from TJ’S Organic Gardens
3rd Place: Sour Pebbles from Firebros
 
Best Medical Indica Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Kosher Kush from Phenotype Farmers
2nd Place: Rainbow Kush from A Green Cure
 
Best Medical Hybrid Cannabis Strains
1st Place: Zeus OG from A Greener Today
2nd Place: Super Lemon Haze from A Green Cure
3rd Place: GSC (f.k.a Girl Scout Cookies) from Fweedom Collective with Aurum Farms
 
Best Medical Cannabis Concentrates
1st Place: Blue Dream x Tangie from Vader Extracts & Grateful Meds
2nd Place: Dutch Treat Shatter from Rainier Alternative
3rd Place: Lemon Oranges from River City Holistics Health with Gold Coast Extracts
 
Best High CBD Cannabis Products
Flower: Sour Tsunami #3 from Solstice
Concentrate: CBD Simple from Cannavest
Edible: Lunch Box from Florida Buds and Arborside Compassion
